Apart from the above-mentioned staff member, all the other staff whom we encountered were pleasant and some even friendly. 
The toilet of our deluxe room was spacious and comfortable. 
The location of the hotel ( just situated across from Taipei Main Station ) is its best feature.
Very convenient for travelling around the city and even beyond, since we are able to access the MRT, the Trains ( TRA ) and the High Speed Rail ( HSR ) all within the Taipei Main Station Building, with is literally within 2 minutes'  walking distance from the hotel or 1 min if you take the lift to the basement of the hotel which is directly linked to the Taipei Main Station building. 
The Taipei Main Station is also a huge mall with lots of eating places, some modestly priced and others more expensive, to suit different tastes / budgets.
Good experience overall.
And would definitely recommend this hotel.,,We had a deluxe room. However, it was a bit small. Also, there were only 2 packets of coffee ( per day ) provided in the area above the fridge. ( In any case, the coffee did not taste good. Perhaps a regular brand like Nescafe might be more welcoming and cosy. ) 
There were no spoons, forks or plates ( which would have been very handy since we bought snacks/cakes during our 8 night stay ). We tried to make do without these items but after the third day, we caved in requested for 2 each of the spoons, forks and plates.  We rang the reception to request for the items. A lady staff came to deliver the items prompty but she was pretty gruff about it and did not have the proper attitude - it seemed almost like we should not be bothering her to bring these items when such items ( or at the very least the spoons ) are normally provided in most hotel rooms that we have stayed in.
 ( To be more accurate, there was a plate of fruit for us on the first day, however only one set of fork and knife came with that plate. ),,
Large room, clean and excellent location plus with helpful staffs,,

title: Great location and excellent breakfast. Nice cot for toddlers.

text: Location was great,,The hotel is very old and smelly,,

The Hotel is across the street from Taipei Station and has direct access to the underground concourse that connects to the Metro, the station and a number of shops.  Could not be more convenient.   Staff was great in meeting our needs, and the hotel was excellent value for money.,,The room we were "upgraded" to at check-in was not suitable for our needs and was not the room we thought we had booked online.  It was recently renovated, but the window view was just too close to an adjacent building.  They did give us room that met our needs better in terms of the city view, but it was not a renovated room and was dated.  Overall though, our stay was fine and the staff tried very hard to meet our needs. I would stay there again, anytime.,,
Great location and Great service.   They recognized my profile and provided me great memorial service. I would like to say thank you.,,We hope we will chose more nice view room in next time.,,
I was disappointed for the booking on Nov 9 - 11 The room was not matched with expectation.,,

I like the yumcha place at the third floor. I like the room prepared for me is at a high level. near the lift and with a relatvely good view.,,I wasnt able to extend my stay one more night, from three to four nights cos that night was fully booked.,,
The hotel was convenient to the train station & restaurants.,,The hotel rooms were old & smelled bad,,

Centrally located convenient location, direct Metro (subway) to the airport, modern comfortable room, English speaking reception staff (some speak Japanese), courtious bell staff, friendly concierge desk,,Nothing!,,

The linkage to the TRA, HSR and MRT is simply awesome! However, please note that the linkage does not open 24 hours. 
My husband and I were pleasantly surprised when the hotel upgraded our room. Checking in and out were seamless!,,No proper window.,,

Arrived an hour early for checkin and room was not yet available. Had to wait for almost 2 hours before I got the room. Looks like they dont read the message from this site Regarding arrival time. AC not working well in the room. Housekeeping didnt clean well. Breakfast is definitely NOT GOOD.Service is getting worst.,,

Location: The hotel is located on Taipei Main Station where you can take the hotelâ€™s elevator to level B1. There are few restaurants under hotel so donâ€™t worry about having nothing to eat.
Safety: Because this hotel connect with Main station so visitor can take the lift to access hotel but in order to access the guest room you need to use key card before selecting the floor.

It is very conveniently located by the Taipei Main Train Station. You can take the express airport train to the station and you can walk to the hotel underground (Keep you cool in summer, warm/dry when it rains. But the path may be confusing if you don't check the map posted all the way throughout the station). It is close to shopping (Both the department store, or small shops) and food at night. The room is also bigger than other hotels in Taipei. It is not the same as the Westin, Hyatt, or Hilton around town, those would have newer furnishing and toiletries but you have to pay twice the rates.,,The toiletries could have gone up a notch without costing the hotel too much. Areas of the hotel could use some updating. The lobby is a bit small to wait for people.,,

Best location, friendly staff and really clean. Very impressed with their prompt responses, willingness to help us out and just overall super proactiveness.,,Nothing at all!,,

I asked for an additional day's accommodation at the last minute and although the property was sold out they found me a room within an hour. The staff were responsive, incredibly courteous and helpful. My room was spacious and very comfortable after recent refurbishment and had everything I needed for a business trip. Location right next to the main train station with direct access is very convenient.,,My only minor reservation would be the quality of the breakfast but it was Okay overall. The restaurant lacks atmosphere and feels a little too functional but there is nothing wrong specifically and there is plenty of choice on the doorstep.,,
Location,,The air conditioning was uncontrollable and made the room too cold.,,
Location, staff, and hotel is very clean. I got very good deal.,,Everything is ok,,

Our second stay at Caesar Park. Excellent staff. The reception staff, doormen, concierge were well trained and always courteous and helpful. We got what appeared to be a recently renovated room. Housekeeping did an excellent job of cleaning the room.  Excellent location. Great access from the underground (direct access halfway up the M6 exit). We loved the rooftop garden--got a rice ball nearby and had it for breakfast there.,,No negative points really, but we noticed we could hear water running, our next door neighbour (?) coughing and on the phone. It didn't bother us all that much though. Could also faintly hear the hum of the automobiles which also didn't bother us as we're city dwellers, but those who're sensitive to noise might want to request a quiet room.,,

I like the location and the staff was very friendly. Good value for money and convenient to travel around. Overall very good experience staying there, relaxing and worth the money. I will stay back there again if I ever travel to Taipei again.,,The tub could use some maintenance or replacement, I didn't really like seeing it hence I didn't use it, only used the showers which was sad because I requested for the bathtub to be able to use it but ended up not using it. The light switches can also be replaced, they seem to be falling off though not faulty.,,

Thank you,,

The cleaning staff was coughing and sneezing in our room for the last 2 days when cleaning our room. We informed the front desk, they imediately took action to check on the clesaning staff, sanitize our room twice and offerred to change our room for us. They assured us the cleaning staff is fine too. The hotel constantly santized the area and checked the tempature of all visitors and staff. They also provided sanitizer for all visitors.  We felt safe and assured.,,There are flies in the toilet that bite.,,

Location is convenient.,,Went out in the morning, returned back to room at 5pm.  Once opened room door was shocked that room was still not cleaned up. Called the Reception they said will check with housekeeping but could not provide reason why. A few minutes later some one knock on the door. Housekeeping Supervisor and staff standing outside asking to clean room. We told them to come back at 5.30pm as we need to take a rest. Asked what happened why our room not cleaned. The reply was staff is new and work slower and probably missed out our room. Is this reason acceptable? Anyway, we returned later in the night and the room is done plus a plate of complimentary fresh fruits. The room small window is behind the bed. The top of curtain do not completed covered the window. Hence early morning sunlight came through and quite disturbing.,,
